first_translate: no wonder...

hangle: 괜히 북쪽 산맥의 마물들을 지배하는 놈이 아니야.
first_translate: it’s not called  “the ruler of all demonic creatures” for nothing.

hangle: 여태 상대한 놈 중 가장 성가셨어…
first_translate: that was by far the most annoying one I’ve ever fought against...
I almost died back there.
siegren.
good work out there.

hangle: 마물의 수장 중 하나를 죽인 기분이 어떠냐.
first_translate: how does it feel to have killed one of the leaders among those monsters?
not that great.

hangle: 수도로 돌아가려면, 정식적인 황자로 임명받아야 한다.
first_translate: in order to return to the capital, you must first become an official prince.

hangle: 그러기 위해 필요한 건 그럴듯한 공적.
first_translate: and what you need to do is achieve something impressive enough to prove yourself worthy.
that's why I did it.
but I don’t really feel any sense of satisfaction or accomplishment from this.
still... now I can go home.
to my homeland where mother’s murderers are waiting for me.
and also...
where fiona will be--

hangle: 그 녀석이 아직도 수도에 붙어있는지 모르겠군요.
first_translate: I’m not even sure if he’ll still be at the capital when we get there.

hangle: 남의 속도 모르고 관광이나 해야겠다고 종알거렸는데.
first_translate: all he said before leaving was how much fun he would have sightseeing without anyone knowing his identity.
don’t worry about him.
for my poor apprentice,
I left behind some secret weapons inside the manor just in case.
now then, let us check on our soldiers.
huh?

hangle: 대체 어떻게 피오나를 붙잡아 놓는다는 걸까.
first_translate: just how exactly am I supposed to keep her here?
she’s as free-spirited...
...as the wind itself.
siegren.

hangle: 난 너에게 상처 주지 않을 거야.
first_translate: I promise I won’t hurt you.
and someday...

hangle: 분명 아주 많은 것을 가지게 될 거야.
first_translate: you shall gain everything your heart desires.
with that being said, she ran off like always.
fiona.

hangle: 내가 지금까지 가지고 싶다고 생각한 건
first_translate: the only thing I wanted up until now...
...was revenge.

hangle: 그 한 가지를 위해서 아주 많은 것들이 필요하게 되었지만.
first_translate: but in order to make that happen, I needed many other things too.
a dragon’s heart...
...will bring me honor beyond anything else.
wait for me,
fiona.
wow...
this is house haylon’s residence in the capital city?

hangle: 마왕성 같았던 헤일론 성보다 훨씬 세련되었네.
first_translate: it looks so much more refined than their castle, which looked like a demon king’s lair.
even the outer walls and training grounds look well-maintained.
and they planted flowers according to each season.

hangle: 외관만 봤을 땐 잘 관리되고 있는 것 같아….
first_translate: from the outside, it seems very well-managed...

hangle: 마음 같아선 정원사를 칭찬해 주고 싶을 정도인데…
first_translate: if possible, I’d love to compliment whoever takes care of these gardens...

hangle: 그 사람들이 보기엔 난 윗선에서 내려온 감시자겠지.
first_translate: but to them, I'm probably someone sent down from above to monitor them.
maybe they think I’m duke abel’s underling.
I doubt the servants will welcome me warmly.

hangle: 나도 불편한 장소에 오래 있을 생각은 없으니,
first_translate: I don’t plan on staying long either,
so I might as well finish quickly and leave.
I told the gatekeeper why I came,
so I assume everyone knows already.
welcome,
lady fiona.
my name is celine, and I manage this estate.
I heard lots about you from his grace.
come right in, lady fiona.

hangle: 헤일론 저택에 오신 것을 진심으로 환영합니다.
first_translate: on behalf of house haylen, allow me to give you a warm welcome.
welcome,
lady fiona!
uh...
what’s going on?!

hangle: 보통 귀족가라도 이렇게 성대하게 환영해주진 않는데.
first_translate: normally, noble families wouldn’t greet guests so extravagantly.
are you tired after traveling such a distance?
your room has been prepared.

hangle: 원하시는 식사가 있다면 얼마든지 말씀해 주세요.
first_translate: let us know if there’s anything specific you wish to eat.
everything tastes good.

hangle: 역시 인간이란 먹기 위해 사는 게 틀림없어.
first_translate: as expected, humans live solely for food.

hangle: 내가 좋아하는 음식이 뭔지 어떻게 안 걸까?
first_translate: how did they find out what foods I liked?
wait, but more importantly...
I had another reason for coming here.
celine.

hangle: 저는 아벨의 명에 따라 이 저택을 둘러보러 왔는데요.
first_translate: duke abel ordered me to inspect this place while I stay here.
of course! I've made preparations for that as well.
right after dinner, I'll show you around myself.

hangle: ―해서 여기까지 저택의 주요 장소는 안내를 마쳤습니다.
first_translate: and that concludes today’s tour of the main areas within the estate.
next...
ah,
would you perhaps want to take a look at the account books?
thank you.
this is thick.
there are plenty more, so I’ll fetch them for you.
at least they seem friendly toward me...

hangle: 사람을 겉만 보고 판단할 수는 없어.
first_translate: but you shouldn’t judge people based on appearance alone.
while thinking that, I decided to read through every page carefully.
I haven’t found any signs of double-entry bookkeeping yet...
at least, not yet.

hangle: 가장 쉽게 일어날 수 있는 일이 바로 횡령이다 보니,
first_translate: embezzlement happens often because it’s so easily done.
I can’t afford to overlook anything suspicious...
they wrote way too much into these records!

hangle: 전부 보는 데만 몇 달이 걸릴지도 몰라!
first_translate: it could take months to read through all of this!
isn’t this...

hangle: 장부 보기 싫어서 날 보낸 거 아냐?!?
first_translate: ...why abel sent me here instead of doing it himself?!!!
looks like he’ll be stuck here for quite some time.
well since it turned out like this,
I guess I’ll hurry up and finish reading everything!!
or so...
...I thought.
what happened?!
